scriptedEmail.name: Forum Thread
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to a forum thread in a subscribed to forum.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#set($authorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.ForumThread.Author.Url) #if ($authorUrl)
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.ForumThread.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#else
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.ForumThread.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', width='32', height='32' }")
#end 		#if ($authorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.ForumThread.Author.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.ForumThread.Author.DisplayName #end
$context_v1_email.Context.ForumThread.Body('Email')
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Footer">You received this notification because you subscribed to {forum_name_link}. To stop receiving updates from only this thread, {mute_thread_link}.</resource> <resource name="Footer_ReportAbuse">{report_abuse_link}.</resource> <resource name="Mute">go here</resource> <resource name="ReportAbuse">Flag as spam/abuse</resource> <resource name="Subject">{thread_subject}</resource> <resource name="Subject_WithMailingList">[{mailing_list_name}] {thread_subject}</resource> </language>
